sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
unhappily
, nismo srečni ali zadovoljni, ko tisto delamo.

seg.quote: He trudged unhappily towards the house.

sense.def:
Z besedo
unhappily
izrazimo obžalovanje glede tistega, o čemer govorimo.

seg.quote: Unhappily, George had died by the time Ralph got to America.
